org.jbox2d.callbacks

Class DebugDraw

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbox2d.callbacks.DebugDraw

  • public abstract class DebugDraw
extends Object
    Implement this abstract class to allow JBox2d to automatically draw your physics for debugging purposes. Not intended to replace your own custom rendering routines!
    Author:
    Daniel Murphy

        public void drawPolygon(Vec2[] vertices,
                        int vertexCount,
                        javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Draw a closed polygon provided in CCW order. This implementation uses drawSegment(Vec2, Vec2, Color) to draw each side of the polygon.
        Parameters:
        vertices -

        color -
